meanings.definition: A person or thing that names.
meanings.sent1: The namer wrote the labels on all the jars.
meanings.sent2: The teacher is the namer of the class pets.
meanings.sent3: The namer decided to call the cat 'Whiskers McFluffy'.
meanings.sent4: She was the namer of dreams, giving life to the intangible.
meanings.sent5: The namer's role is crucial in identifying objects accurately.

meanings.definition: A person who gives a name to someone or something.
meanings.sent1: The proud namer of the newborn baby was the grandmother.
meanings.sent2: The author is the namer of the characters in the story.
meanings.sent3: The namer playfully named her plants after famous celebrities.
meanings.sent4: He became the namer of stars, assigning them their celestial identities.
meanings.sent5: The namer's task is to bestow identity upon the nameless.
